actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to improve the administration of the AFDC program by standardizing work expense allowances and clarifying budget procedures with regard to the earned income disregard.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to revise the method of determining earned income.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to improve the administration of the AFDC program by standardizing work expense allowances and clarifying budget procedures with regard to the earned income disregard.
